summary: Debbie and Gerald's lives drastically change after they get a gun. Their mysterious neighbor, Skippy, becomes and important and transforming figure in their lives.
cast: Diane Lane|James Le Gros|Stephen Collins|Tess Harper|Bruce Altman|Maddie Corman|Bill Raymond|Suzzy Roche|Philip Seymour Hoffman|Patti Chambers|Stephen Pearlman|Leslie Brett Daniels|Paul J.Q. Lee|Angela Marie Baker|Kent Gash|Gene Canfield|Gussie Levy|LaChanze|Harry Blackman|Frank John Hughes|Kane Picoy|Loni Ackerman|Nancy Friedman|Matt Malloy|Billy Martin
title: My New Gun
